li.label: Innocence
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s heart has innocence. Maybe it's because you've never experienced a tough world before. [PAWN_pronoun] will be more traumatized by violent acts such as cannibalism, organ harvesting and sight of dead bodies.

li.label: bleeding heart
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a big heart and gets very emotional. [PAWN_pronoun] loves helping people, and abhors violence and injustice. [PAWN_pronoun] is more affected by these things than others.
